name: Air Fryer Breakfast Sandwich On the Go
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Working from home during the pandemic has forced me to get creative and work around what was my normal routine. While I enjoy that "famous" breakfast muffin from the comfort of my own home now, I came up with this on-the-go air fryer version to send off with my husband in the mornings. The fast food chain has nothing on this.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (1.2 oz) patty fully cooked breakfast sausage
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Center a mason jar lid, upside down, on a 5-inch square of aluminum foil
Fold the foil up and around the lid to act as a round mold
Spray the foil with nonstick spray and crack egg into the center
Place egg mold and frozen sausage patty next to each other in the air fryer basket; cook for 4 minutes
Flip sausage patty over, add English muffin halves, and cook 4 minutes more
Place one English muffin half on a sheet of parchment paper
Add cheese, sausage patty, and egg
Top with remaining English muffin half
